snippet.title: OPUS: The Day We Found Earth - Official PC Trailer
snippet.description:
OUR STEAM PAGE:https://goo.gl/ewJN14 

Remember the first time you looked up with awe and wonder on a clear, starry night? OPUS puts you in a star-filled sky to re-experience that moment. 

Millions of years in the future, mankind has forgotten its origin - Earth, and you must help a robot carry on his creator’s wish of finding it, through the lens of a space telescope.

*The art and in-game assets of OPUS has been completely redone in HD for PC, with the world and characters brought to life through new, fully animated cutscenes.

=========
If you like this game, then you might also be interested in our new game - OPUS : Rocket of Whispers!

OPUS : Rocket of Whispers
Android:https://goo.gl/aJYzfL 
iOS: https://goo.gl/6M9okz
